OVERVIEW.TITLE: Overview
OVERVIEW.NO_KNOWN_DEVICES_DESC: Add a device using the buttons below: Either scan the local network for available devices or manually enter a device id.
OVERVIEW.DISCOVER_BUTTON: Discover and auto pair with device
OVERVIEW.ERROR_NABTO_NOT_AVAILABLE: Installation problem: Nabto SDK not available, please contact vendor.
OVERVIEW.ERROR_UNKNOWN: App could not start, please contact vendor:

ADD_DEVICE.TITLE: Manually add device
ADD_DEVICE.AC_DESC:
Your public key fingerprint must be added to the device's Access Control List before you can access the device. The device owner can add this.

Share your public key fingerprint here:
ADD_DEVICE.ERROR_ACCESS_DENIED: Access denied - the device owner must add your public key fingerprint to the device access control list. Use the share button on this page to share your fingerprint with owner.
ADD_DEVICE.ERROR_DEVICE_ACCESS: An error occurred when accessing device
ADD_DEVICE.ERROR_QR_MISSING_ID: Missing device ID in QR code.

PROFILE.TITLE: Keypair creation
PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: Enter the name to identify this {{platform}} device when communicating with other devices.
PROFILE.NAME: Name to associate with keypair
